startPage.title: Am I a Lovebug??
startPage.description:
I lost consciousness due to a lovebug attack,
When I opened my eyes... I had become a lovebug!
What kind of lovebug am I?

resultPage.shareWithFriendsDescription: Share this test with your friends and find their lovebugs!

share.title: My Lovebug Type Result
share.text: I found my lovebug type! Find your type here:

adPage.pleaseWait: Please wait while we find your inner lovebug.

questions.question:
One day,
a lovebug flew into the human world!
If it were me?

choices.text: Flap my wings near new people to attract attention!
Quietly hide in a corner, secretly observe, and chuckle.

questions.question:
Lovebug neighborhood party invitation arrived!
I am:

choices.text: Excitedly sparkle my wings and immediately attend for a fun dance party!
Thinking, 'What does this have to do with me?' It's better to quietly enjoy honey alone in a corner.

questions.question:
When the moment comes to peek at a human couple's
love...
I am:

choices.text: 'Wow! I want a love like that!' Already excited and rushing over.
'Hehe, I'll approach carefully later!!' Chuckling to myself.

questions.question:
Today, I, a lovebug, am spreading love!
Before dating, I:

choices.text: 'These two are destined!' I imagine their fate first.
'Height, age, distance, financial status... I consider conditions first.' Cold analysis.

questions.question:
When another lovebug approaches me
I am:

choices.text: 'Maybe we're destined for love?' My heart is already fluttering!
'Are their wings strong? Do they have enough food?' Checking practical conditions.

questions.question:
Tonight,
I, a lovebug, fall into thought on a quiet flower petal:

choices.text: 'If I were the king of lovebugs, who would love me?' A time for wild fantasies.
'What will the flower garden atmosphere be like tomorrow? I'll check in advance if there's enough love energy!' Reality check activated.

questions.question:
My friend lovebug, who failed in love,
is crying with drooping wings...
I:

choices.text: â€˜Oh dear... you must have been so sad!â€™ I cry with them and pat their wings.
â€˜Let's analyze why they failed first! Next time, we need a different dating strategy.â€™ A realistic analyst.

questions.question:
If another lovebug suddenly made a shocking confession,
I:

choices.text: My wings tremble, I'm flustered by emotions, but I try to understand.
My heart rate is calm... 'How do I handle this?' A dating strategy meeting begins in my head!

questions.question: If I had to describe my dating philosophy in one word:

choices.text: If emotions connect, everything is possible! If it's sincere, I can fly anywhere.
Emotions alone are not enough! Dating also needs strategy and a sense of reality.

questions.question:
Suddenly, I'm in danger of being caught by a human couple!
I:

choices.text: Lovebug instinct activated! 'Whoosh, whoosh, whoosh!' Attempting an impromptu escape.
Quickly analyze the surroundings! Escape by perfectly timing the direction and moment to flee.

questions.question: Today's lovebug dating strategy goal is:

choices.text: An impromptu mode following the scent of flowers! Planning to fly wherever my heart takes me~
A perfectly prepared dating strategy with a strict schedule: 'Approach at this time, charm at that time' complete!

questions.question: On a date day, my preparation style is:

choices.text: Impulsive styling based on the flower garden atmosphere + my mood that day!
Simulating everything from wing color and conversation topics to dating strategies the day before!

ISFJ.description:
A type that slowly and quietly blossoms their heart.
When dating, speed isn't important; 'sincerity' is the most important thing, isn't it? They slowly read the other person's heart and patiently wait until they connect deeply. They like being alone, but are ready to open their heart to someone they truly connect with!

ESFP.description:
Heart throb at first sight! A type that falls for looks.
They can't hide their excitement, and at the beginning of a relationship, they burn like fire. Impulsive and direct, so dating appointments are 'Meet right now!' But if they feel someone is their person, they immerse themselves passionately.

ISTJ.description:
Speed? I don't know about that...
I want a cautious love. A type that deeply understands the other person and slowly opens their heart. They may seem indifferent on the outside, but inside, they are incredibly warm and deep. They only confide in people they truly trust.

ENFP.description:
â€œDating? It has to be fun!â€
A type that enjoys impulsive and free love. Dates are decided on the spur of the moment! Plans? They don't have any. A free-spirited lovebug that values atmosphere and fun over emotions.

ENFJ.description:
I am the protagonist, the center of the world!
They enjoy attention and compliments on their appearance are sweet as honey. They have a slight attention-seeking tendency, but their judgment of people is very sharp. Dating is always full of excitement, and appealing to their charm is basic.

ESFJ.description:
â€œGetting close? Itâ€™s a piece of cake!â€
With a warm and friendly personality, they quickly become close to others. They are excellent at sensing othersâ€™ moods. When dating, they are always affectionate, and the moment of giving and receiving love is happiness!

INFJ.description:
â€œLove must be sincere!â€
They value emotional exchange and deep conversations the most. They dream of a â€˜soul connectionâ€™ with their partner and always approach with sincerity. A devoted and warm love that they slowly and steadily maintain for a long time.

INTJ.description:
Appearing chic on the outside, but burning intensely inside.
They pretend to be cool, then suddenly become deeply immersed with a surprising charm! They are skilled in psychological warfare and excellent at push-and-pull. They enjoy a moderate distance and tension, a cool-headed lover in the midst of passion.

ISFP.description:
Possessing a warm and cozy atmosphere.
They prefer calm and stable relationships, and dislike rushing. They find happiness in small daily routines and are a steadfast, long-lasting type. Once they start, they don't easily end it, a true gem of a lover.

ESTP.description:
A type that enjoys fast and thrilling relationships!
Impulsive and unpredictable, they can start a relationship with someone they met today! They dislike being tied down and enjoy love lightly and playfully. A dating adventurer who doesn't know who they'll spark with tomorrow.

INFP.description:
â€œIâ€™m a lovebug with a lot of attachment!â€
They have deep emotions and strongly rely on their partner when dating. They might have a slight tendency to be clingy, but itâ€™s because they overflow with affection. They dislike being alone and always need someone by their side to feel comfortable.

ENTP.description:
â€œFree love is the best!â€
An adventurous type that canâ€™t stay in one place for long and seeks new stimuli. They are incredibly honest about intense momentary attractions, but can also cool down quickly. Instead of leaving coolly when bored, they immerse themselves passionately in the moment, a love runner.

ISTP.description:
â€œSweet and warm love is the best!â€
They firmly embrace their partner and generously give devoted love. They always seek stable relationships and are very responsible. When dating, they like a sweet atmosphere and don't hold back on sincere expressions of affection.

ENTJ.description:
â€œDating is like a game!â€
A master at captivating others with a mysterious aura and charming words. They always lead the relationship leisurely from a step behind and enjoy psychological warfare. They don't take love too seriously, but they are better than anyone at stealing hearts.

INTP.description:
â€œSlowly, gently, Iâ€™ll love at my own pace.â€
They love being alone so much that they start relationships quietly and slowly. They dislike rushing and only want to meet people who respect their pace. But once they open their heart, they are steadfast and consistent.

ESTJ.description:
â€œLove fast, run fast!â€
A type that enjoys impulsive and energetic relationships. They constantly seek new people, new places, and new excitements. Casual encounters are OK, and they are a free-love advocate who runs away immediately when bored!
